readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.Mon: Keep it up, kid. I think you're gonna be a star.#$e#Just ask me if you need anything.
content.Tue: I knew you'd end up here someday. Of course, I had to make it a little difficult so you'd have an incentive to achieve excellence.
content.Wed: I was born an ordinary boy, but I made a decision early in life that I would become extraordinary.
content.Thu: Hey. Don't tell anyone about this place, okay? I want to keep it... exclusive.#$e#You'd keep a secret for your friend Mr. Qi, wouldn't you?
content.Fri: Never stop striving to achieve perfection.#$e#Settle for nothing less than excellence in everything you do.
content.Sat: Stop by whenever you wanna relax.
content.Sun: Keep working hard and maybe you'll end up like me someday.
